question: Reds vs. Pirates
description:
In the upcoming MLB game, scheduled for May 19 at 6:40PM ET:
If the Cincinnati Reds win, the market will resolve to “Reds”.
If the Pittsburgh Pirates win, the market will resolve to “Pirates”.
If the game is postponed, this market will remain open until the game has been completed.
If the game is canceled entirely, with no make-up game, this market will resolve 50-50.
To know when a postponed game will be played, please check the home team's schedule on MLB.com for the listed team and look for the game described as a makeup game.

question: Will the price of Ethereum be less than $2400 on May 19 at 5 PM ET?
description:
This market will resolve according to the final "Close" price of the Binance 1 minute candle for ETH/USDT 19 May '25 17:00 in the ET timezone. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

The resolution source for this market is Binance, specifically the ETH/USDT "Close" prices currently available at https://www.binance.com/en/trade/ETH_USDT with "1m" and "Candles" selected on the top bar.

If the reported value falls exactly between two brackets, then this market will resolve to the higher range bracket.

Please note that this market is about the price according to Binance ETH/USDT, not according to other sources or spot markets.

events.title: Ethereum Price - May 19, 5PM ET
events.description:

question: NBA Playoffs: Thunder vs. Timberwolves (To Advance)
description:
This market refers to the 2025 NBA Western Conference Finals matchup between the Oklahoma City Thunder and Minnesota Timberwolves.

If the Thunder advance to the 2025 NBA Finals, this market will resolve to “Thunder”.

If the Timberwolves advance to the 2025 NBA Finals, this market will resolve to “T-Wolves”.

If the series is canceled or postponed beyond July 20, 2025, 11:59 PM ET, this market will resolve 50-50.

The resolution source for this market will be official information from the NBA.

events.title: NBA Playoffs: Thunder vs. Timberwolves (To Advance)

question: Will the Timberwolves beat the Thunder 4-1?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Minnesota Timberwolves defeat the Oklahoma City Thunder in 5 games, resulting in a 4-1 series outcome. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the Oklahoma City Thunder win more than one game in their Western Conference Finals matchup against the Minnesota Timberwolves in the 2024–2025 NBA Playoffs, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be NBA.com.

events.title: NBA Playoffs: Thunder vs. Timberwolves series outcome
events.description: This is a market on the outcome of the 2025 NBA Western Conference Finals matchup between the Oklahoma City Thunder and Minnesota Timberwolves.

question: Will the Timberwolves beat the Thunder 4-2?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if the Minnesota Timberwolves defeat the Oklahoma City Thunder in 6 games, resulting in a 4-2 series outcome. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

If the Oklahoma City Thunder win more or fewer than 2 games in their Western Conference Finals matchup against the Minnesota Timberwolves in the 2024–2025 NBA Playoffs, this market will immediately resolve to "No".

The resolution source will be NBA.com.

events.title: NBA Playoffs: Thunder vs. Timberwolves series outcome
